            "title": [["Create the server certificates"]]
          },

          "type": "text",
          "version": 1
        }
      },
      "61531e33-cee4-4e8d-8fd8-7e4b4fde7c81": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_table": "notion_user",
          "created_time": 1550383925309,
          "id": "61531e33-cee4-4e8d-8fd8-7e4b4fde7c81",
          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1550383925309,
          "parent_id": "add963fe-9f49-48bb-a636-740cb249baaa",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["Plain Text"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "openssl genrsa 2048 > ca-key.pem\nopenssl req -sha1 -new -x509 -nodes -days 3650 -key ca-key.pem > ca-cert.pem\nopenssl req -sha1 -newkey rsa:2048 -days 730 -nodes -keyout server-key.pem > server-req.pem\nopenssl rsa -in server-key.pem -out server-key.pem\nopenssl x509 -sha1 -req -in server-req.pem -days 730  -CA ca-cert.pem -CAkey ca-key.pem -set_serial 01 > server-cert.pem"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 5
        }
      },
      "6cd53456-b9f1-43c1-883b-71d21f6c3f78": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_table": "notion_user",
          "created_time": 1550383925312,
          "id": "6cd53456-b9f1-43c1-883b-71d21f6c3f78",
          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",

            "language": [["Plain Text"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "# vi /etc/my.cnf\n# i\n[mysqld]\nbind-address=*\nssl-ca=/etc/pki/tls/certs/ca-cert.pem\nssl-cert=/etc/pki/tls/certs/server-cert.pem\nssl-key=/etc/pki/tls/certs/server-key.pem\n# :wq"

            ]
          },

          "version": 1
        }

        "role": "comment_only",

      "c376ecae-4c81-4a7c-a4bd-a77749883dea": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_table": "notion_user",
          "created_time": 1550383925311,
          "id": "c376ecae-4c81-4a7c-a4bd-a77749883dea",
          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1550383925311,
          "parent_id": "add963fe-9f49-48bb-a636-740cb249baaa",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["Plain Text"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "openssl req -sha1 -newkey rsa:2048 -days 730 -nodes -keyout client-key.pem > client-req.pem\nopenssl rsa -in client-key.pem -out client-key.pem\nopenssl x509 -sha1 -req -in client-req.pem -days 730 -CA ca-cert.pem -CAkey ca-key.pem -set_serial 01 > client-cert.pem"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 1
        }
      },
